page.title: 15OLD PEOPLE IN HEDON
page.content: {Caring for the Elderly} The latter part of the 20th century has witnessed an increase in the population of old people.This is due mainly to improved diet,health care and living conditions and has resulted in a growing social concern for the care of elderly people. Two important buildings in our area are Holyrood House and Albemarle,both situated in Baxtergate,Hedon. { {Albemarle} is a new purpose built home for old people,it was opened in 1971. { {Holyrood House}is an old building that was converted into a home for the elderly in 1959.In the garden stands {Kilnsea Cross}which was moved in order to protect it from coastal erosion its place of origin is now covered by the sea.
